item.description:
Fellow member Lydia is part of the board of a non profit called the Capoeira and Arts Association of New England. They're having a traditiional Brazilian Churrasco (bbq) as a fundraiser. There will be music, laughs, and of course some capoeira. Please come and enjoy all you can eat for just $15.

WHEN ~ Sunday, September 28th, Noon to Sundown {Rain Date ~ 10/05}

WHERE ~ 320 Brookline St. Rear Cambridge, MA 02139. Free Street Parking on Sundays. Short walk from Central Square T-Station (Red Line) near B.U. Bridge & Charles River.

WHAT ~ Fundraiser BBQ/Churrasco. Tasty delights grilled by a Brazilian Churrasqueiro, a Capoeira Regional Roda around 3pm with Mestre Chuvisco, as well as DJ's Cruzz, KC and Mizont playing Afro~Latin~Deep~Soulful House Grooves to get down with your funky selves to.

WHY ~ Spread the awareness and expression of the art of Capoeira and support the future endeavors of non-profit organization Capoeira & Arts Association of New England & Capoeira group Mandingueiros dos Palmares.

HOW ~ Spread the Word & Bring your Good Vibes, Dancing Shoes & Ax√© to help raise funds for a good cause.

COST ~ $15 for Entry & BBQ/Churrasco.
$10 advance ticket sale prior to day of event via Cash or PayPal.
Kids under 5 Free, 5 and up are $5.

Email borboleta030@gmail.com for advance purchase.

Proceeds donated to non-profit Capoeira & Arts Association of New England. Bring your own Beer~Wine~Spirits.

R.S.V.P. much appreciated to help determine amount of food/supplies needed.
item.how_to_find_us: Lydia will place a Portuguese Meetup sign on a table for us to find each other

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: sOuL on FiRe All You Can Eat Churrasco
